name: Threshold (itch) (Ethearian)
description:
Team 1 - The Cache Cats

Inside a world that’s in between, 

Ensure your charge remains unseen. 

Collect that which has been displaced, 

To return to your journey’s pace.

Please use the Threshold_final.zip version for judging - if that fails, try Build.zip or Threshold.zip.

To view controls, press "C" on the keyboard.

RIDDLE SOLUTIONS FOR EASY JUDGING:

In the RED dimension: Dog faces Rabbit, Rabbit faces Dog, Bear faces Dog, Snake faces Bear.
In the GREEN dimension: The interactable for Spring is hidden to the left, up the slope. Hit the symbols in order of the seasons!
In the BLUE dimension:  Collect all of the pinging fireflies!
